name: Fireworks Night
description:
Relaxing Strategy game about building a small fireworks show, with some auto-battler inspired mechanics

Was trying to achieve a atmosphere similar to nintendo games on the Wii.

How to play:

  • Buy fireworks by dragging them to the brown square at the top.
  •  You can hover over fireworks in the shop to see their price and effect.
  • In game you left click a tile to detonate it, revealing either a firework or a blank square. 
  • The numbers on each tile represent the amount of fireworks in the surrounding tiles.
  • Right clicking puts a flag on the tile, useful for tiles where you know there isnt a firework.
  • Over the next 10 rounds try to click as many fireworks as possible to add to your final score!
